script.name: Show switch LLDP details
script.comments: Factory script to print switch LLDP information
script.content: ################################################################ # System scripting.Script # # scripting.Script : show lldp information # Revision : 1.0 # Last updated : 01/05/2008 # Purpose : Displays switch LLDP information # ################################################################ IF (!$match($isExos,true) ) THEN show lldp ELSE show lldp ports all detail ENDIF
script.creator: system
